      • Subnet

        public Subnet​(Node... nodes)
       throws DuplicateConnectionException
        Constructs a subnet with the given nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodes - The nodes to be added to the subnet.
        Throws:
        DuplicateConnectionException - if a node is already connected to a network, it cannot be connected to this subnet because is now being created.
